function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Incomplete reduction of viral load in wastewater treatment systems","Impact":"Potential spread of SARS-CoV-2 through effluents","Mitigation":"Enhance wastewater treatment processes to ensure complete reduction of viral load","Technologies":"Advanced filtration and disinfection technologies","People":"Wastewater treatment facility workers, surrounding communities","Owner":"Wastewater treatment facility management"},{"Description":"Detection of gene fragments in effluents","Impact":"Possible presence of infectious SARS-CoV-2 virus in effluents","Mitigation":"Develop more sensitive testing methods to confirm the presence of infectious virus","Technologies":"Advanced genetic and virological testing methods","People":"Public health officials, researchers","Owner":"Public health agencies, research institutions"},{"Description":"Unlikely infectivity and replication-competence of released viral particles","Impact":"Misinterpretation of viral particles as non-infectious when they may still pose a risk","Mitigation":"Further research to assess the potential infectivity of released viral particles","Technologies":"Virus culture and infectivity testing methods","People":"Public health researchers, virologists","Owner":"Research institutions"}]}
